description: Source code for a thread-safe handler for browser metrics implementing the Observer pattern, including callback management and unit tests.

classes.name: BrowserMetricHandler
classes.description: Handles browser metrics with thread-safe callback updates and implements the Observer trait.

methods.name: new
methods.description: Creates a new BrowserMetricHandler with specified ID and callback.

methods.name: update_callback
methods.description: Updates the callback function for the handler.

methods.name: on_metric_update
methods.description: Handles metric updates, invoking callback if metric is of type BrowserMetric.
